q: `` I stand by what I've said about those events but when the spokesman needs a spokesman, it's time to move on,'' Andy Coulson said in a statement announcing his resignation. Unfortunately, continued coverage of events connected to my old job at the News of the World has made it difficult for me to give the 110 percent needed in this role, he added.
